thread.title: KKR Founder Jerome Kohlberg Dies at 90
thread.title_full: KKR Founder Jerome Kohlberg Dies at 90

title: KKR Founder Jerome Kohlberg Dies at 90
text:
Deals & Deal Makers KKR Founder Jerome Kohlberg Dies at 90 Financier was an architect of the leveraged buyout and built a leading private-equity firm with Henry Kravis and George Roberts By @mariebeaudette Aug. 1, 2015 12:42 p.m. ET 
Jerome Kohlberg, an architect of the leveraged buyout and co-founder of private-equity giant KKR & Co., has died. He was 90. 
Mr. Kohlberg died at his Martha’s Vineyard home on Thursday after a long battle with cancer, according to Kohlberg & Co., the firm he founded after he left KKR in 1987. 
“Jerry led an amazing life and leaves... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Popular on WSJ
